name: Landing Page Design
description:
Landing page re-design for EmbedStories

EmbedStories is a platform that allows users to embed Instagram stories on any website with just one code line.


I recently finished a masterclass by Paul Boag for designing websites that convert.

Here are some key takeaways I want to share with you.


The "perfect" funnel:

  1. Hero/Summary
  2. Social Proof
  3. Benefits - Promise to deliver value
  4. Features - How you deliver the value
  5. Social Proof
  6. CTA


Note:

  1. Trust -> Conversion. Design with trust in mind.
  2. Simplify.
  3. Know your users.
